name: Kin
intro: The Community for the digital world
introduce: Kin is a thriving community of apps, developers, content creators, and millions of active users that earn and spend Kin, while participating directly in the value generated from their contributions, bolstering the Kin Ecosystem. Kin was originally launched by KIK interactive, the developer of instant messaging application KIK, in September 2017. Two years later, KIK application was acquired by MEDIAlab.
